title: Make AR URF Always Available
body:
I've been having a lot of fun with summoner's rift and I feel like riot did a really good job of fixing past mistakes with the last 2 patches. The one request I have for Riot is to make AR URF available ALWAYS like ARAM is. AR URF is basically the only rotating game mode I look forward to, to be honest. 
I think that just like ARAM, it's really a good way for league players to take a break from the normal game and chill, especially after tilting for a couple of games. AR URF is just so fun and chill, and I think anything that is making the game fun for players right now is important in this many times flaming/tilting/trolling community we have at the moment.

replies.body:
>I think that just like ARAM, it's really a good way for league players to take a break from the normal game and chill

That's a problematic viewpoint, as ARAM *is* the normal game for some players.

Regardless, permanent (AR)URF wouldn't be a good idea. It'd add an extra burden on dev resources while overlapping SR and ARAM's gameplay/audience. Dominion was removed because of a similar drain on resources, but at least Dominion had the potential to reach a different audience compared to League's other mdoes.
